app.name: Rootly
app.short_description: View Rootly incidents and attach tickets
app.long_description:
### Declare Rootly incidents from Zendesk

Connect support agents to Rootly with a view of recent and related incidents inside Zendesk.

* Attach tickets to new or existing incidents
* View recent incidents
* Create new incidents

For more information refer to [Rootly's Zendesk integration documentation](https://docs.rootly.com/integrations/zendesk).

### About Rootly

Rootly is the #1 ranked incident management platform used by 100s of fast-growing companies. Manage incidents directly from Slack. Automate tedious processes. Integrates with PagerDuty, Opsgenie, Jira, Google Docs, 30+ tools.
app.installation_instructions:
If you're not a Rootly customer and you're interested in learning more about how Rootly can streamline your incident management, please visit [rootly.com](https://rootly.com).

### Getting Started

1. First generate a Rootly API key by going to [User Settings â†’ API Keys](https://rootly.com/account/api-keys).
2. Click the Install button above (on this page) to install the Rootly app in your Zendesk account.
3. Enter your Rootly API key generated in step 1 in the API key field.
4. Navigate to a support ticket and view the Rootly app in the sidebar. If you're asked to install the integration please do so.

### Support

Visit [rootly.com/help](https://rootly.com/help) for help and support using the Rootly Zendesk app.
